headline: S&P 500 Announces Ares Will Replace Kellanova Stock
summary: The investment firm will replace  Kellanova  which owns Pringles, Cheez-It, Pop-Tarts, and other snack brands.  Private company Mars Inc. has agreed to acquire the company, and the deal is expected to close soon.  Ares  with a market capitalization of $54 billion, is one of the largest companies by market capitalization not currently in the S&P 500 index.

headline: European Commission approves Mars’ acquisition of Kellanova
summary: “The evidence collected did not support a finding that the proposed transaction would increase Mars' bargaining power vis-à-vis retailers,” the Commission said.

headline: Mars Receives Final Regulatory Approval and Moves to Close Acquisition of Kellanova
summary: MCLEAN, Va., & CHICAGO, December 08, 2025--Mars, Incorporated, a family-owned, global leader in pet care, snacking and food and Kellanova (NYSE: K), a leader in global snacking, international cereal and noodles and North America frozen foods, today announced that Mars has received unconditional approval from the European Commission for its pending acquisition of Kellanova. As a result, all required regulatory approvals and clearances for the pending transaction have been obtained.

raw.headline: Mars Receives Final Regulatory Approval and Moves to Close Acquisition of Kellanova
raw.summary: MCLEAN, Va., & CHICAGO, December 08, 2025--Mars, Incorporated, a family-owned, global leader in pet care, snacking and food and Kellanova (NYSE: K), a leader in global snacking, international cereal and noodles and North America frozen foods, today announced that Mars has received unconditional approval from the European Commission for its pending acquisition of Kellanova. As a result, all required regulatory approvals and clearances for the pending transaction have been obtained.

headline: Mars to close $36B Kellanova acquisition following EU approval
summary: The merger, the largest since Kraft Heinz's combination in 2015, would create a snacking giant with a portfolio including M&Ms, Snickers, Pringles and Pop-Tarts.

raw.headline: Mars to close $36B Kellanova acquisition following EU approval
raw.summary: The merger, the largest since Kraft Heinz's combination in 2015, would create a snacking giant with a portfolio including M&Ms, Snickers, Pringles and Pop-Tarts.

headline: RXBAR Expands Beyond the Bar with New Protein Energy Bites
summary: RXBAR, a brand known for its transparency and No B.S. promise, believes that simple and nutritious food should also taste great. That belief inspired the brand's latest innovation: RXBAR Protein Energy Bites — a delicious, multi-layer snacking option that takes RXBAR beyond the bar and into an entirely new format.
